title: Is my wife liable ?
question: When she and her ex got divorced,he was supposed to pay a medical debt for his eyes,he hasnt paid and now they are coming after her. The divorce papers says it is his debt and he agreed.
answers: If she is a joint-debtor on the medical bill, then she may be; her remedy would be to go after her ex for reimbursement.
